title: Acelane Inflatable Air Camp Pad Lightweight Sleeping Mat Mattress with Pillow Compact for Camping Backpacking and Hiking
feature: Ripstop 20D Nylon fabric w/ high-end TPU coating
★【PREMIUM MATERIAL】 Made of Ripstop 20D Nylon fabric w/ high-end TPU coating. It is ultralight, durable, waterproof and tear-resistant with no leaking. It can support up to 120kg weight capacity.

★【LIGHTWEIGHT & COMPACT】 It only weights 440g (0.97 lbs) with inflated size being 193 * 58 * 5.6 cm / 76 * 22.9 * 2.2 inches (L*W*H), easily fit into your backpack, save the space, perfect for travelling.

★【BUILT-IN PILLOW】 Pillow is designed with comfort in mind with the built-in pillow. Contoured center cradles your head and support your neck, rest your head and neck, allow you enjoy a comfortable sleep even on the journey.
★【EASY TO INFLATE AND DEFLATE】 With a wide valve nozzle, it inflates with just 12 to 13 full breaths and deflates, and you can adjust the pillow fitness by more or less air inflation.

★【PORTABLE & VERSATILE】 A package size of 22 * 9 cm / 8.5 * 3.5 inches (length * width) makes it perfect for camping, backpacking, hiking or traveling ,also a best gift for your family,not only adults,but also children ,suitable for all the family members.
description: Made of Ripstop 20D Nylon fabric w/ high-end TPU coating, this ultralight and compact air sleeping pad provides you optimal support with ergonomic design and air cell design. No more sore back or annoying discomfort from little rocks or leaves underneath. It is also quick and easy to inflate and deflate, perfect for camping, backpacking, hiking or traveling. Ripstop 20D Nylon fabric w/ high-end TPU coating Light weight and compact Easy inflation and deflation large bearing capacity (120 kg) Perfect for camping, hiking, backpacking, traveling Material: 20D nylon fabric and TPU Capacity: 1 person Inflated size: 193 * 58 * 5.6 cm / 76 * 22.9 * 2.2 inches (length * width * height) Package size: 22 * 9 cm / 8.5 * 3.5 inches (length * width) Package weight: 440g (0.97 lbs) Air sleeping mat * 1 Repair kit pack * 1 Storage bag * 1 18months from the date of purchase
